rules.title: Designated Parking
rules.description: Each unit is allotted one designated parking space. Please park only in your assigned spot.

rules.title: Visitor Parking
rules.description: Visitors must use the designated visitor parking area. Overnight visitor parking requires prior approval from the management office.

rules.title: Two-Wheeler Parking
rules.description: Two-wheelers should be parked in the designated two-wheeler parking zone only.

rules.title: No Blocking
rules.description: Do not block other vehicles or common pathways. Vehicles causing obstruction may be towed at the owner's expense.

rules.title: Reporting Issues
rules.description: Report maintenance issues to the management office during office hours or via the community WhatsApp group for urgent matters.

rules.title: Interior Modifications
rules.description: Any structural modifications to your unit require prior written approval from the association. This includes changes to walls, plumbing, and electrical systems.

rules.title: External Workers
rules.description: All external workers (plumbers, electricians, etc.) must register at the security desk before entering the premises.

rules.title: Visitor Registration
rules.description: All visitors must register at the security gate with valid identification. Residents should inform security in advance about expected visitors.

rules.title: Visiting Hours
rules.description: Visitors are welcome between 7:00 AM and 10:00 PM. Overnight guests should be registered with the management office.

rules.title: Delivery Personnel
rules.description: Delivery personnel are allowed entry only to the ground floor lobby. Residents should collect their deliveries from the lobby area.

rules.title: Quiet Hours
rules.description: Quiet hours are observed from 10:00 PM to 7:00 AM. Please keep noise to a minimum during these hours.

rules.title: Music & Events
rules.description: Playing loud music or hosting events with amplified sound requires prior permission from the management office and should not extend beyond 10:00 PM.

rules.title: Construction Noise
rules.description: Interior renovation work producing noise is permitted only between 9:00 AM and 5:00 PM on weekdays.

rules.title: Cleanliness
rules.description: Please keep common areas clean. Do not leave personal belongings in corridors, stairways, or lobbies.

rules.title: Children's Play Area
rules.description: Children under 10 must be supervised by an adult in the play area. Equipment should be used responsibly.

rules.title: Leash Requirement
rules.description: All pets must be on a leash when in common areas. Pet owners are responsible for cleaning up after their pets.

rules.title: Registration
rules.description: Pet owners must register their pets with the management office and provide vaccination records.

rules.title: Restricted Areas
rules.description: Pets are not allowed in the children's play area.

rules.title: Segregation
rules.description: All waste must be segregated into wet (green bin) and dry (blue bin) categories before disposal.

rules.title: Collection Times
rules.description: Waste collection happens daily between 7:00 AM and 9:00 AM. Please keep your segregated waste ready for collection.

rules.title: E-Waste & Hazardous
rules.description: E-waste and hazardous materials should not be mixed with regular waste. Contact the management office for special disposal arrangements.

rules.title: Gate Access
rules.description: Use your access card/key to enter the premises. Do not share your access credentials with unauthorized persons.

rules.title: CCTV
rules.description: The premises are under 24/7 CCTV surveillance for the safety of all residents. Do not tamper with or obstruct any cameras.

rules.title: Suspicious Activity
rules.description: Report any suspicious activity immediately to the security desk or the management office.

rules.title: Emergency Exits
rules.description: Familiarize yourself with emergency exit routes. Do not block fire exits or store items in emergency pathways.
